R

receiveOutput() - Method in interface PipelineElement
A method that can be overriden for getting back the input that was earlier codified.
receiveOutput() - Method in class Plugboard
A method that sends the output earlier calculated back.
receiveOutput() - Method in class Reflector
A method that sends back the output for further processing.
receiveOutput() - Method in class Rotor
A method that will be called for getting back the encoded input.
Reflector - Class in <Unnamed>
A class that implements the basic functionalities of a reflector, part of the pipeline structure that models the inner working of the Enigma machine.
Reflector() - Constructor for class Reflector
A constructor with no parameters that initializes the fields of the class.
Rotor - Class in <Unnamed>
A class that implements two interfaces and implements the basic component of an Enigma machine : a rotor.
Rotor() - Constructor for class Rotor
A constructor that deals with initialization of the class' fields.
